messages.content: Can you help me find an advanced halal indian recipe using what I have in my pantry?
You are a helpful recipe assistant.
Can you help me find an advanced halal indian recipe using what I have in my pantry?

Absolutely! Please let me know what ingredients you currently have in your pantry and any specific preferences or restrictions you have. This way, I can recommend an advanced halal Indian recipe tailored to your available ingredients.
